Thanks to the Ubuntu newsletter I read about Phoronix, a cool tech blog, and then found out about Canonical's Landscape, and then about nwu. Cool how this stuff is all connected.

I've been thinking about how to manage multiple computers in an organized manner. Not only for updates, but also for general management. I've briefly examined tentakel and need to actually try it out some day.

And oh yeah, I also need to investigate the LaBrea Tarpit one of these days.
